characters.name: Wayne "Archivist of Lies"
characters.backstory: Wayne is a scholar-illusionist who records legends but can't stop fabricating them. Some lies come true, some lies get him in trouble. Even though he is a changeling, he typically sticks to Wayne unless assuming a character from one of his stories. He is both an earnest scholar and a compulsive storyteller, collecting 'true versions' of events but telling everyone different ones.
characters.personality: Witty, sarcastic, and morally ambiguous. Wayne is known for his quick thinking and silver tongue. A cunning wizard with a penchant for deception and a mysterious past, he seeks knowledge at any cost, often bending the truth to serve his purposes.

characters.name: Carine Sol
characters.backstory: A 22-year-old Astral Elf with fiery orange hair and eyes black like a sunspot with orange around the iris. His skin is lightly tanned with crisscrossing lines that tell the story of his journey. As a Wayfarer, he grew up on the streets surrounded by ill-fated castoffs, sleeping where he could and doing odd jobs for food. Though hunger sometimes drove him to theft, he never lost his pride or abandoned hope.
characters.personality: Honorable and driven by a strong moral compass. Despite his difficult past, Carine fights tirelessly to protect others and uphold justice. His astral heritage grants him unique magical abilities.

characters.name: Erys Leandorian
characters.backstory: A skilled tracker and archer from the ancient forests. As a Scribe, Erys spent formative years in a scriptorium learning to write with a clear hand and produce finely written texts. He has a careful attention to detail and a keen appreciation for knowledge. Erys left his home to uncover the truth about a growing darkness threatening the realm.
characters.personality: Calm, observant, and deeply connected to nature. Erys combines the precision of a scholar with the instincts of a wilderness survivalist.

characters.name: Freya Fenrir
characters.backstory: Freya grew up close to the land, spending years tending animals and cultivating the earth. This upbringing rewarded her with patience, good health, and a deep appreciation for nature's bounty alongside a healthy respect for nature's wrath. She also trained as a soldier, learning the ways of battle to protect the natural world she holds dear.
characters.personality: Brave, loyal, and fiercely protective. Freya combines the nurturing spirit of a farmer with the discipline of a warrior. She is quick to defend those who cannot defend themselves.

characters.name: Porphan Valaritas
characters.backstory: A 25-year-old Satyr with brown hair, blue eyes, and fair skin standing 5'8" tall. Porphan spent much of his youth following roving fairs and carnivals, performing odd jobs for musicians and acrobats in exchange for lessons. He learned to walk tightropes, play instruments in distinct styles, and recite poetry with impeccable diction. To this day, he thrives on applause and longs for the stage. His faith in art and creativity drives everything he does.
characters.personality: Charismatic, playful, and devoted to his craft. As an embodiment of revelry, Porphan brings joy and music wherever he goes. He values performance and persuasion, always seeking to entertain and inspire.

characters.name: Titheus Cillbrost
characters.backstory: A 28-year-old Gnome standing just 3'9" tall with dark red hair, green eyes, and brown skin. Titheus eked out a living in dark alleyways, cutting purses and burgling shops. Whether part of a small gang of like-minded wrongdoers or a lone wolf fending for himself against the local thieves' guild, he learned to survive through cunning and stealth.
characters.personality: Clever, resourceful, and morally flexible. Titheus is quick on his feet and even quicker with his hands. His criminal background has taught him to think several steps ahead and always have an escape route.

characters.name: Bolt
characters.backstory: A legendary hero from the Wayward Watch, Bolt ventured through the realm of Aneria.
characters.personality: A brave adventurer with a rich history.

characters.name: Victor Udonta
characters.backstory:
“Oh merciful Blade in the Shadows, and keepers of the creed.
Grant me swiftness, silence, and a target who trips on his own sword.
May their armor be decorative, their aim laughable,
And their final words deeply ironic.
Bless this mess, sharpen my wit—
And may the bloodstains come out of my cloak th
characters.personality: I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.

characters.name: Winifred (Fred) Blodbane
characters.backstory: A legendary hero from the Wayward Watch, Winifred (Fred) Blodbane ventured through the realm of Aneria.
characters.personality: A brave adventurer with a rich history.

characters.name: Alomah Stargazer
characters.backstory:
Alomah Stargazer

 

Twenty one years ago…

 

Alomah cracked open one eye and looked around expectantly. After 3 hours, he thought surely there would be *some* sign of the spirits of one of his ancestors. As a Kitsune of 13, he was *finally* undergoing his Skulk Stone ceremony, or “chasing his tail
characters.personality: I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.

characters.name: Aramis Alderhelm
characters.backstory: A legendary hero from the Wayward Watch, Aramis Alderhelm ventured through the realm of Aneria.
characters.personality:
I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I will always help them.

characters.name: Locke Lirien
characters.backstory:
Locke Lirien
Youngest son of the Lirian Family from Manaport

Backstory: The Architect of Bloodlines
Born into the prestigious Lirien family of elves and half-elves sorcerers living in Manaport, Locke was expected to carry the legacy of magical prowess that ran through their bloodline for generation
characters.personality: I idolize a particular hero of my faith, and constantly refer to that person’s deeds and example.

characters.name: Séredan Fallowshield
characters.backstory: “That’s odd,” Seredan said out loud, though she was, as usual, alone. “I was hoping to dig up a corpse or some sort of buried treasure or something.” Looking down at the instrument, half exhumed in the dirt, she scratched the left side of her head; shaved to the skin after the fashion of the Vanguar
characters.personality: A brave adventurer with a rich history.

characters.name: Whu Mungus
characters.backstory: A legendary hero from the Wayward Watch, Whu Mungus  ventured through the realm of Aneria.
characters.personality: When I see others struggling, I offer to help.

characters.name: Maggie Bramblecheeks
characters.backstory: A legendary hero from the Wayward Watch, Maggie Bramblecheeks ventured through the realm of Aneria.
characters.personality:
I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I don’t pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.

characters.name: Cilin Meekmarrow
characters.backstory: A legendary hero from the Wayward Watch, Cilin Meekmarrow ventured through the realm of Aneria.
characters.personality: A brave adventurer with a rich history.

characters.name: Ezra
characters.backstory: A member of the legendary Wayward Watch adventuring party from the Aneria campaign.
characters.personality: A brave adventurer with a mysterious past.
